presentation.title: ðŸ‘‹ Hi! I'm Agustina Casarone
presentation.description: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer from La Plata, Argentina, specialized in Java, SQL, and Angular. I thrive on crafting innovative and scalable software solutions that make a real impact.
presentation.professional_background: With a solid foundation in backend technologies like Spring Boot, Quarkus, and Sonar, combined with a keen eye for frontend development using Angular and Bootstrap, I bring a comprehensive approach to software development. I excel in pixel-perfect development and beautiful UX/UI designs, ensuring high-quality and efficient results.

full_stack_developer_radar.title: Full Stack Developer - AngularTS, Java, SQL
full_stack_developer_radar.description: Design, development and construction of a task organization and project categorization system.

technologies.spring_actuator: Spring Actuator for service health checking
technologies.retrofit: Retrofit for configuring connections to external REST services
technologies.mapstruct: MapStruct for entity to DTO mapping
technologies.openapi: OpenAPI for generating online documentation of REST endpoints

technical_workshop_java.title: Technical Workshops - Virtual Threads vs Platform Threads in Java 17
technical_workshop_java.description: Researched, prepared the curriculum, and delivered a workshop for ITR, comparing the qualities and uses of virtual threads and platform threads in Java.

technical_workshop_react.title: Technical Workshops - React 18 Workshop
technical_workshop_react.description: Conducted a workshop comparing React 18 with Angular 17, discussing the differences between vanilla React and React with Next.js, the new features of version 18, and the requirements for updating a project from an earlier version of React.

full_stack_developer_solistica.title: Full Stack Developer - AngularTS, Java, SQL
full_stack_developer_solistica.description: Development of a business management system covering Service Delivery, Client Management, Product Shipments, and Goods Travel Management.

full_stack_developer_fenix.title: Full Stack Developer - AngularTS, Java, SQL
full_stack_developer_fenix.description: An in-company Enterprise Management Software. We have daily meetings and use agile methodologies to ensure the best experience to our users.

dog_groomer.title: Dog Groomer - Specialized in Asian Fusion
dog_groomer.description: I learned how to interact with my clients (both dogs and humans), communicate my ideas to someone who doesn't know the technical language of the job, adapt my style to different people, use my skills in different ways and combine my knowledge in different areas to get the best results.

certified_tech_developer.title: Certified Tech Developer
certified_tech_developer.description: Completed a comprehensive 2-year degree covering Web Design, Learning Agility, Agile Methodologies & Scrum, JavaScript programming, UX/UI Design, and Software Quality Testing. Developed skills in MySQL databases, React.js, Java OOP and Spring Boot, AWS infrastructure, Cloud Computing, and effective communication and collaboration within work teams. Successfully managed professional challenges demonstrating the practical application of acquired knowledge.

responsive_web_design_certification.title: Responsive Web Design Certification
responsive_web_design_certification.description: Completed a Responsive Web Design Certification focusing on HTML for content and CSS for design. Developed skills in building basic web applications like a cat photo app, advanced techniques such as CSS variables for dynamic styling, and implementing best practices for accessibility through projects like a quiz site. Proficient in creating responsive webpages using Flexbox for photo galleries and CSS Grid for magazine article layouts.

cs50_c.title: CS50 - C
cs50_c.description: Harvard University's introductory course in computer science and programming. Gained a robust understanding of computer science concepts such as abstraction, algorithms, data structures, encapsulation, resource management, security, software engineering, and web development. Strong knowledge in languages including C, Python, SQL and JavaScript, with practical experience in real-world inspired problem sets and a final programming project.

itr_angular_avanzado.title: ITR - Angular Avanzado
itr_angular_avanzado.description: In-company course focused on the updates of Angular v17 with the use of Tailwind. Additionally, the creation of a NodeJS backend and a Mongo database.

daeava_sql_intermedio.title: DAEVA - SQL INTERMEDIO UTN
daeava_sql_intermedio.description: This course corresponds to an Intermediate Level of Managing Information Persistence through SQL SERVER. Topics covered include complex SQL queries, data structures, triggers, TSQL syntax, and scripts.

licenciatura_en_informatica.title: Licenciatura en InformÃ¡tica
licenciatura_en_informatica.description: The profile of a graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics is that of a professional with a strong theoretical foundation in Computer Science and a focus on the application of information technology in areas such as: networks, distributed systems, processor architecture, and operating systems, as well as advanced studies in algorithms and their applications. This education also enables participation in Research, Development, and Innovation activities within the discipline.

100_days_of_code.title: 100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp
100_days_of_code.description: A comprehensive 60+ hour course covering Python 3, web development, data science, automation, and real-world projects. Gained expertise in tools like PyCharm, Jupyter Notebook, and Flask, and built practical applications such as web scrapers and desktop GUIs.

ejam.name: eJam postulation project
ejam.description:
This was made in 24hs for a Full Stack Developer position at eJam. 
 It is a pixel perfect working webpage based on the design I was given.
 I used Angular 18 with Tailwind for the development.
